dragonic-ancestry.name: Draconic Ancestry
dragonic-ancestry.description: You have draconic ancestry. Your breath weapon and damage resistances are determined by your draconic type.

breath-weapon.name: Breath Weapon
breath-weapon.description: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Your draconic ancestry determines the size, shape, and damage type of the exhalation.

damage-resistance.name: Damage Resistance
damage-resistance.description: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.
